blocks.name: diff.crgspn.s
diff.crgspn.c
diff.crgspn.w
df-subrg
blocks.content: Define a subring of a ring as a set of elements that is a ring in its own right and contains the multiplicative identity. The additional constraint is necessary because the multiplicative identity of a ring, unlike the additive identity of a ring/group or the multiplicative identity of a field, cannot be identified by a local property. Thus, it is possible for a subset of a ring to be a ring while not containing the true identity if it contains a false identity. For instance, the subset ` ( ZZ X. { 0 } ) ` of ` ( ZZ X. ZZ ) ` (where multiplication is componentwise) contains the false identity ` <. 1 , 0 >. ` which preserves every element of the subset and thus appears to be the identity of the subset, but is not the identity of the larger ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: df-rgspn
blocks.content: The ring-span of a set of elements in a ring is the smallest subring which contains all of them. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: issubrg
blocks.content: The subring predicate. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm issubrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c1))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0))), wcel(c1, crg))
  mptrcl(hs0, c0, csubrg, c1, crg, crab(hs1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  simpll(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0)))
  bitrd(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0))), wcel(c0, crab(hs1, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1), crab(hs1, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c1, crg))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, crg, csubrg, crab(hs1, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)))), crab(hs1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))
  rabeqbidv(hs1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cpw(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1))))
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cbs)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cress, cv(hs1)), crg, co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cress, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cur, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cur)
  df-subrg(hs0, hs1)
  rabex(hs1, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1))))
  pwex(c2)
  syl5bb(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c0, crab(hs1, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1))))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0))), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0))))
  3bitri(wcel(c0, crab(hs1, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(c2)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wcel(c3, c0))), wa(wss(c0, c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wcel(c3, c0))))
  elrab(hs1, c0, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wcel(c3, c0)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wcel(c3, c0))
  eleq1d(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg, co(c1, cress, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c0, c1, cress)
  eleq2(cv(hs1), c0, c3)
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cpw(c2)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wcel(c3, c0)), wss(c0, c2))
  elpw2(c0, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c1)
  an12(wss(c0, c2), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wcel(c3, c0))
  anbi1d(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg)))
  ibar(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg))
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(hs1, cpw(c2), wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, cv(hs1)), crg), wcel(c3, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg), wcel(c3, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issubrg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(SubRing ` c1)‚Üî((c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring)‚àß(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(1r ` c1)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà(SubRing ` c1), ((c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring)‚àß(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)), c1 ‚àà Ring)
  mptrcl(hs0, c0, csubrg, c1, crg, { hs1 ‚àà P((Base ` hs0))|((hs0[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß(1r ` hs0)‚àà hs1)})
  simpll(c1 ‚àà Ring, (c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  bitrd(c1 ‚àà Ring, c0 ‚àà(SubRing ` c1), ((c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring)‚àß(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)), c0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà P(c2)|((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1)})
  eleq2d(c0, (SubRing ` c1), { hs1 ‚àà P(c2)|((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1)}, c1 ‚àà Ring)
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, crg, csubrg, { hs1 ‚àà P(c2)|((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1)}, { hs1 ‚àà P((Base ` hs0))|((hs0[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß(1r ` hs0)‚àà hs1)})
  rabeqbidv(hs1, P((Base ` hs0)), P(c2), hs0 = c1, ((hs0[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß(1r ` hs0)‚àà hs1), ((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1))
  pweqd((Base ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cbs)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, (hs0[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring, (1r ` hs0)‚àà hs1, (c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring, c3 ‚àà hs1)
  eleq1d((hs0[|`s]hs1), crg, (c1[|`s]hs1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, cress, hs1)
  eleq1d((1r ` hs0), hs1, c3, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((1r ` hs0), c3, (1r ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cur)
  df-subrg(hs0, hs1)
  rabex(hs1, P(c2), ((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1))
  pwex(c2)
  syl5bb(c1 ‚àà Ring, c0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà P(c2)|((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1)}, ((c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring)‚àß(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)), ((c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)))
  3bitri(c0 ‚àà { hs1 ‚àà P(c2)|((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1)}, ((c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß(c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)), (c0 ‚àà P(c2)‚àß((c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)), (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß((c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)))
  elrab(hs1, c0, P(c2), ((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1), ((c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  anbi12d(hs1 = c0, (c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring, c3 ‚àà hs1, (c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring, c3 ‚àà c0)
  eleq1d((c1[|`s]hs1), crg, (c1[|`s]c0), hs1 = c0)
  oveq2(hs1, c0, c1, cress)
  eleq2(hs1, c0, c3)
  anbi1i(c0 ‚àà P(c2), ((c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), c0 ‚äÜ c2)
  elpw2(c0, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c1)
  an12(c0 ‚äÜ c2, (c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring, c3 ‚àà c0)
  anbi1d(c1 ‚àà Ring, (c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring, (c0 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), (c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring))
  ibar(c1 ‚àà Ring, (c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring)
  diff.hs0.c(crg)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ hs1 ‚àà P(c2)|((c1[|`s]hs1)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà hs1)})
  diff.hs1.c(P((Base ` hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(((c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Ring ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
}

blocks.name: subrgss
blocks.content: A subring is a subset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: subrgid
blocks.content: Every ring is a subring of itself. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm subrgid(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  syl21anbrc(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), crg), wa(wss(c1, c1), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), c1)))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cress, c1), crg, c0, wcel(c0, crg))
  ressid(c0, crg, c1)
  id(wcel(c0, crg))
  jctil(wcel(c0, crg), wss(c1, c1), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), c1))
  ringidcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), c1)
  ssid(c1)
  issubrg(c1, c0, c1, cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm subrgid(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  syl21anbrc(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring, (c0[|`s]c1)‚àà Ring, (c1 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß(1r ` c0)‚àà c1))
  eqeltrd((c0[|`s]c1), crg, c0, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  ressid(c0, crg, c1)
  id(c0 ‚àà Ring)
  jctil(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚äÜ c1, (1r ` c0)‚àà c1)
  ringidcl(c0, (1r ` c0), c1)
  ssid(c1)
  issubrg(c1, c0, c1, (1r ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))
}

blocks.name: subrgring
blocks.content: A subring is a ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: subrgcrng
blocks.content: A subring of a commutative ring is a commutative ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subrgcrng(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wcel(c2, ccrg))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cress, c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wcel(c2, ccrg), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c2), ccmn))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(cmgp, c2), ccmn, co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c1), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c1), ccmn), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c1), cmnd))
  crngmgp(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqeltrd(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c1), cmnd, cfv(cmgp, c2), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))))
  mgpress(c0, ccrg, c1, cfv(csubrg, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0))), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmnd), wcel(c2, crg))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, c0)), wcel(c2, crg))
  subrgring(c1, c0, c2)
  ringmgp(c2, cfv(cmgp, c2))
  subcmn(cfv(cmgp, c0), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c1), c1)
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cress, c1))
  iscrng(c2, cfv(cmgp, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm subrgcrng(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà CRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0))‚Üí c2 ‚àà CRing)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(c0[|`s]c1)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà CRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0)), c2 ‚àà CRing, c2 ‚àà Ring, (mulGrp ` c2)‚àà CMnd)
  eqeltrrd((mulGrp ` c2), ccmn, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c1), (c0 ‚àà CRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0)))
  syl2an2r(c0 ‚àà CRing, c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0), ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c1)‚àà CMnd, (mulGrp ` c0)‚àà CMnd, ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c1)‚àà Mnd)
  crngmgp(c0, (mulGrp ` c0))
  eqeltrd(((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c1), cmnd, (mulGrp ` c2), (c0 ‚àà CRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0)))
  mgpress(c0, ccrg, c1, (SubRing ` c0), (mulGrp ` c0), c2)
  eqid((mulGrp ` c0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà CRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0)), (mulGrp ` c2)‚àà Mnd, c2 ‚àà Ring)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà CRing, c1 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0), c2 ‚àà Ring)
  subrgring(c1, c0, c2)
  ringmgp(c2, (mulGrp ` c2))
  subcmn((mulGrp ` c0), ((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c1), c1)
  eqid(((mulGrp ` c0)[|`s]c1))
  iscrng(c2, (mulGrp ` c2))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c2))
}

blocks.content: A subring is a subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Dec-2014.)

thm subrgsubg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cgrp))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c1, crg))
  subrgrcl(c0, c1)
  ringgrp(c1)
  subrgss(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cgrp), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), crg))
  subrgring(c0, c1, co(c1, cress, c0))
  eqid(co(c1, cress, c0))
  ringgrp(co(c1, cress, c0))
  issubg(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))

}
blocks.pretty:
thm subrgsubg(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(SubRing ` c1)‚Üí c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(c0 ‚àà(SubRing ` c1), c0 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c1), c1 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1), (c1[|`s]c0)‚àà Grp)

  subrgring(c0, c1, (c1[|`s]c0))

blocks.name: subrg1
blocks.content: A subring always has the same multiplicative identity. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm subrg1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c1, cress, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c1))
} = {
  syl6reqr(c2, cfv(cur, c3), cfv(cur, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))

  3imtr4g(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c4)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wrex(hs2, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))

blocks.name: subrgdv
blocks.content: A subring always has the same division function, for elements that are invertible. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)

blocks.content: An element of a ring is a unit of a subring iff it is a unit of the parent ring and both it and its inverse are in the subring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: subrgugrp
blocks.content: The units of a subring form a subgroup of the unit group of the original ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm subrgugrp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cress, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cui, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cui, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cress, c5))
} = {
  mpbir3and(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c3)), wss(c2, c5), wne(c2, emptycls), wral(hs0, c2, wa(wral(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1)), c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c1), cv(hs0)), c2))))
  subrguss(c0, c1, c2, c5, c4)
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c4, crg), wcel(cfv(cur, c4), c2))
  1unit(c4, cfv(cur, c4), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cur, c4))
  ne0i(cfv(cur, c4), c2)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wa(wral(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1)), c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c1), cv(hs0)), c2)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wral(hs1, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1)), c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c1), cv(hs0)), c2))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1)), c2))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1)), c2))
  eqeltrd(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1)), c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  oveqd(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c4)))
  ressmulr(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1), cfv(cmulr, c1), c4, c1)
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c4), cv(hs1)), c2), wcel(c4, crg))
  unitmulcl(c4, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c4))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c1), cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c4), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  subrginv(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cinvr, c1), cfv(cinvr, c4), c4)
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c4), cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(c4, crg))
  subrgring(c0, c1, c4)

thm rhmeql(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, crh, c2))), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubrg, c1)))

  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, crh, c2))), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c1))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  rhmghm(c0, c1, c2)

  rhmmhm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))
  rhmmhm(c3, c1, c2, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))

  mhmeql(c0, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2), c3)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, crh, c2))), wb(wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubrg, c1)), wa(wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(cdm(cin(c0, c3)), cfv(csubmnd, cfv(cmgp, c1))))), wcel(c1, crg))

thm subrgpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(SubRing ` c0)=(SubRing ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (SubRing ` c0), (SubRing ` c1), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, hs0 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0), hs0 ‚àà(SubRing ` c1), ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c0[|`s]hs0)‚àà Ring)‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c0)‚àß(1r ` c0)‚àà hs0)), ((c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c1[|`s]hs0)‚àà Ring)‚àß(hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1)‚àß(1r ` c1)‚àà hs0)))
  anbi12d(w0, (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c0[|`s]hs0)‚àà Ring), (hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c0)‚àß(1r ` c0)‚àà hs0), (c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß(c1[|`s]hs0)‚àà Ring), (hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1)‚àß(1r ` c1)‚àà hs0))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ‚àà Ring, (c0[|`s]hs0)‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Ring, (c1[|`s]hs0)‚àà Ring)
  ringpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ringpropd(s0, s1, (c0[|`s]hs0), (c1[|`s]hs0), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), w0)
  syl6eq((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), (Base `(c0[|`s]hs0)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0)), w0)
  ineq2d(hs0, c2, (Base ` c0), w0)
  elv(hs0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c0))=(Base `(c0[|`s]hs0)))
  ressbas(hs0, universe, (Base ` c0), (c0[|`s]hs0), c0)
  syl6eq((hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), (Base `(c1[|`s]hs0)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c1)), w0)
  ineq2d(hs0, c2, (Base ` c1), w0)
  elv(hs0, (hs0 ‚ãÇ(Base ` c1))=(Base `(c1[|`s]hs0)))
  ressbas(hs0, universe, (Base ` c1), (c1[|`s]hs0), c1)
  sylan2(w0, (s0 ‚àà(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àß s1 ‚àà(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)), (s0[(+ `(c0[|`s]hs0))]s1)=(s0[(+ `(c1[|`s]hs0))]s1), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  3eqtr3g((s0[(+ `(c0[|`s]hs0))]s1), (s0[(+ `(c1[|`s]hs0))]s1), (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1), (s0[(+ ` c1)]s1), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))
  oveqi(s0, (+ ` c0), s1, (+ `(c0[|`s]hs0)))
  elv(hs0, (+ ` c0)=(+ `(c0[|`s]hs0)))
  ressplusg(hs0, universe, (+ ` c0), (c0[|`s]hs0), c0)
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  oveqi(s0, (+ ` c1), s1, (+ `(c1[|`s]hs0)))
  elv(hs0, (+ ` c1)=(+ `(c1[|`s]hs0)))
  ressplusg(hs0, universe, (+ ` c1), (c1[|`s]hs0), c1)
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  sylan2(w0, (s0 ‚àà(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚àß s1 ‚àà(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2)), (s0[(√ó `(c0[|`s]hs0))]s1)=(s0[(√ó `(c1[|`s]hs0))]s1), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2))
  anim12i(s0 ‚àà(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), s1 ‚àà(hs0 ‚ãÇ c2), s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2)
  elinel2(s0, hs0, c2)
  elinel2(s1, hs0, c2)
  3eqtr3g((s0[(√ó `(c0[|`s]hs0))]s1), (s0[(√ó `(c1[|`s]hs0))]s1), (s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1), (s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2)))
  oveqi(s0, (√ó ` c0), s1, (√ó `(c0[|`s]hs0)))
  elv(hs0, (√ó ` c0)=(√ó `(c0[|`s]hs0)))
  ressmulr(hs0, universe, (√ó ` c0), (c0[|`s]hs0), c0)
  eqid((c0[|`s]hs0))
  eqid((√ó ` c0))
  oveqi(s0, (√ó ` c1), s1, (√ó `(c1[|`s]hs0)))
  elv(hs0, (√ó ` c1)=(√ó `(c1[|`s]hs0)))
  ressmulr(hs0, universe, (√ó ` c1), (c1[|`s]hs0), c1)
  eqid((c1[|`s]hs0))
  eqid((√ó ` c1))
  anbi12d(w0, hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c0), (1r ` c0)‚àà hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1), (1r ` c1)‚àà hs0)
  sseq2d(hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), w0)
  eqtr3d((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  eleq1d((1r ` c0), hs0, (1r ` c1), w0)
  rngidpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  issubrg(hs0, c0, (Base ` c0), (1r ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((1r ` c0))
  issubrg(hs0, c1, (Base ` c1), (1r ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((1r ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((SubRing ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((SubRing ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cress, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cress, hs0)

  diff.cin.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

thm rhmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, crh, c1), co(c2, crh, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, crh, c1), co(c2, crh, c3), w0)

  anbi12d(w0, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)))), wa(wcel(c2, crg), wcel(c3, crg)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c3)))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(c3, crg))
  ringpropd(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4, w0)
  ringpropd(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c3))))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c2, cghm, c3), w0)
  ghmpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)), co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c3)), w0)
  mhmpropd(s0, s1, cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2), cfv(cmgp, c3), c4, c5, w0)
  syl6eq(c4, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl6eq(c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  syl6eq(c4, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)), cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cmgp, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  syl6eq(c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c3)), cfv(cbs, c3), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cmgp, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  3eqtr3g(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c2)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c2), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c2), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cmgp, c2), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c2))
  3eqtr3g(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c3)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmgp, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c3), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c3)))
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(cmgp, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c3))
  isrhm(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  isrhm(cv(hs0), c2, c3, cfv(cmgp, c2), cfv(cmgp, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, crh, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, crh, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c3)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c3)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
}

  anbi12d(w0, c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Ring, c2 ‚àà Ring, c3 ‚àà Ring)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c3)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c3)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
}
